title: HW5 Q6
content: Context: This is an involved coding problem. It has many components to it and is designed to get you to implement certain key operations by hand as a way to help you understand them better. The final part will require GPUs to train in feasible time (up to a few hours), so using the GPU runtime via colab is recommended.
